actions.text: Amendment SA 3584, under the order of 7/23/2014, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 69. Record Vote Number: 246.

Amendment SA 3584 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S5028-5031, S5038; text: CR S5028) To empower States with authority for most taxing and spending for highway programs and mass transit programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3584 proposed by Senator Lee.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3584, under the order of 7/23/2014, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 69. Record Vote Number: 246.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3584, under the order of 7/23/2014, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 69. Record Vote Number: 246.

purpose: To empower States with authority for most taxing and spending for highway programs and mass transit programs.
